name: CyberpunkProject
description:
Hi everyone!

This is my new project! 

I'm developing this game for my final project on college. 

The game still in development and more features will be added in the future. 

2D plataformer action with exploration where you can control 2 diferent characters while you play, a Warrior and a Ninja.  Each has it's own attributes.  You can also collect some junk pieces of the enemys.  

This is the first demo of this game, its a work in progress. In the next months i'm goind to add new enemys, new maps npcs who can sell itens for the player and. Also, sounds and effects to improve the gamefeel. 

How to play: 

With Xbox360 controller, ps4 controller and keyboard:

Jump - A or X or Space

Attack - Rb or R1 or D

Dash - Rt or R2 or A

Change class - Lt or L2 or C

Block hit - Lb or L1 or S

Movement -  D-pad or arrow keys
